columns.name: group_id
columns.comment: Per-group Tier2 scope

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Unique identifier for the guidance metric record

columns.name: session_id
columns.comment: Reference to the classroom session

columns.name: teacher_id
columns.comment: Reference to the teacher user

columns.name: prompt_category
columns.comment: facilitation, deepening, redirection, collaboration,

columns.name: prompt_id
columns.comment: Unique identifier for the specific prompt

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Unique identifier for hourly metric record

columns.name: school_id
columns.comment: School identifier for data isolation

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Record creation timestamp

columns.name: ai_analyses_completed
columns.comment: Number of AI analyses completed during this hour

columns.name: ai_analysis_success_rate
columns.comment: AI analysis success rate as percentage

columns.name: avg_ai_processing_time
columns.comment: Average AI processing time in milliseconds

columns.name: avg_audio_quality
columns.comment: Average audio quality score for the hour

columns.name: avg_collaboration_score
columns.comment: Average collaboration effectiveness for the hour

columns.name: avg_connection_stability
columns.comment: Average connection stability for the hour

columns.name: avg_engagement_score
columns.comment: Average student engagement score for the hour

columns.name: avg_latency_ms
columns.comment: Average network latency in milliseconds

columns.name: avg_participation_rate
columns.comment: Average student participation rate for the hour

columns.name: avg_response_time
columns.comment: Average system response time in milliseconds

columns.name: avg_session_quality
columns.comment: Average session quality score for the hour

columns.name: calculated_at
columns.comment: When this aggregation was calculated

columns.name: calculation_method
columns.comment: Method used for aggregation (hourly_rollup)

columns.name: data_sources_count
columns.comment: Number of source records aggregated

columns.name: error_rate
columns.comment: Error rate as percentage (0.0-100.0)

columns.name: estimated_compute_cost
columns.comment: Estimated compute cost for this hour

columns.name: metric_hour
columns.comment: Hour of aggregated metrics (e.g., 2024-01-15 14:00:00)

columns.name: ready_groups
columns.comment: Number of groups that were ready during this hour

columns.name: sessions_active
columns.comment: Number of active sessions during this hour

columns.name: sessions_completed
columns.comment: Number of sessions completed during this hour

columns.name: students_active
columns.comment: Number of unique students active during this hour

columns.name: teachers_active
columns.comment: Number of unique teachers active during this hour

columns.name: total_alerts
columns.comment: Total system alerts generated during this hour

columns.name: total_errors
columns.comment: Total system errors during this hour

columns.name: total_groups
columns.comment: Total number of groups active during this hour

columns.name: total_interventions
columns.comment: Total teacher interventions during this hour

columns.name: total_prompts_generated
columns.comment: Total AI prompts generated during this hour

columns.name: total_prompts_used
columns.comment: Total prompts acted upon by teachers

columns.name: total_storage_gb
columns.comment: Total storage used in gigabytes

columns.name: total_transcription_minutes
columns.comment: Total minutes of transcription processed

columns.name: websocket_connections
columns.comment: Peak concurrent websocket connections

columns.name: configured_name
columns.comment: Teacher-assigned group name

columns.name: configured_size
columns.comment: Number of members assigned to group

columns.name: leader_assigned
columns.comment: Whether a leader was assigned to this group

columns.name: leader_ready_at
columns.comment: When group leader marked ready

columns.name: members_configured
columns.comment: Number of members configured for group

columns.name: members_present
columns.comment: Number of configured members actually present

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Unique event identifier

columns.name: session_id
columns.comment: Session this event belongs to (FK to classroom_sessions)

columns.name: teacher_id
columns.comment: Teacher who owns the session (FK to teachers)

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Record creation timestamp

columns.name: event_time
columns.comment: When the event occurred (UTC timestamp)

columns.name: event_type
columns.comment: Event type: configured

columns.name: payload
columns.comment: JSON string with event-specific data (groupId, counts, member info, etc.)

columns.name: adherence_members_ratio
columns.comment: Ratio of actual to planned member participation

columns.name: configured_at
columns.comment: When session was fully configured

columns.name: planned_duration_minutes
columns.comment: Planned session duration in minutes

columns.name: planned_group_size
columns.comment: Target group size configured by teacher

columns.name: planned_groups
columns.comment: Number of groups configured by teacher

columns.name: planned_leaders
columns.comment: Number of group leaders assigned

columns.name: planned_members
columns.comment: Total members planned across all groups

columns.name: planned_scheduled_start
columns.comment: Teacher-scheduled start time

columns.name: ready_groups_at_10m
columns.comment: Number of groups ready at 10 minutes

columns.name: ready_groups_at_5m
columns.comment: Number of groups ready at 5 minutes

columns.name: ready_groups_at_start
columns.comment: Number of groups marked ready when session started

columns.name: started_at
columns.comment: When session was actually started

columns.name: started_without_ready_groups
columns.comment: Whether session started before all groups were ready

columns.name: goal
columns.comment: Learning goal/objectives for the session

columns.name: subject
columns.comment: Subject area for the session

columns.name: argumentation_quality
columns.comment: Score representing the quality of arguments, evidence, and reasoning.

columns.name: conceptual_density
columns.comment: Lexical richness of group discussion.

columns.name: sentiment_arc
columns.comment: JSON string representing the trend of the group sentiment over time.

columns.name: topical_cohesion
columns.comment: Metric indicating how focused the group discussion is.

columns.name: family_name
columns.comment: Student family/last name

columns.name: given_name
columns.comment: Student given/first name

columns.name: preferred_name
columns.comment: Student preferred name
